==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Slash
|desc_1      = Slashes twice with her sword, dealing '''75% ATK''', '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2      = Stab
|desc_2      = Lunges forward and stabs once, dealing '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3      = Boomerang
|desc_3      = Throws her sword, which rapidly spins and flies in a straight line on the first throw, then in an arc before returning to her, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}} in its path. If the sword hits an object while in flight, it will ricochet and knock the Swiftstep Seeker back. Applying {{Dendro}} to her.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A warrior from the Canopy, and a tribal guardian that patrols the forest valleys and mountain streams.<br>Unlike the warriors of other tribes, these warriors, ever swinging around the mountains using their grappling hooks, are always considering how to defeat their opponents with unexpected attacks.|[[Archive]]}}
